greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Decimal expansion of k2, a Diophantine approximation constant such that the area of the "critical parallelogram" (in this case a square) is 4*k2.
comment: Quoting Steven Finch: "The slopes of the 'critical parallelogram' are (1+sqrt(5))/2 [phi] and (1-sqrt(5))/2 [-1/phi]."
Essentially the same as A229780, A134972, A134945, A098317 and A002163. - _R. J. Mathar_, May 23 2014
reference: Steven R. Finch, Mathematical Constants, Cambridge University Press, 2003, Section 2.23, p. 176.
results.author: _Jean-François Alcover_, May 20 2014
